channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Girish Kumar

item.title: Autonomous Ops Agent — AI‑Powered Operations
item.description:
A Streamlit app that uses Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and CrewAI agents to assist HR and security teams with policy queries and log monitoring.

Live Demo

click here ->

Key Highlights:

  • Streamlit frontend for easy use
  • CrewAI-based multi-agent collaboration
  • RAG pipeline with Cohere embeddings
  • Policy question answering and log anomaly detection
  • Deployed on Hugging Face Spaces

Source Code

Source code on GitHub

item.title: Face Score — AI‑Powered Aesthetics
item.description: A Streamlit app that scores facial aesthetics using a custom vision model and Hugging Face Spaces.

item.title: Iris MLOps Pipeline with AWS SageMaker
item.description: An end-to-end MLOps pipeline for Iris classification using AWS SageMaker.
